attributes.action: Give a full life sentence to those whom take someones life in a unprovocked attack
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many peoples lifes are lost during or following a unprovocked attack ,assult, and families are left heartbroken, and serveing a life sentence of their own.Surely if longer sentences were given, this would help prevent ,these attacks,assults. Many counties follow you take a life you serve a life, britain does not, and we have probably one of the highest attack,assult rates in europe, and this needs addressing,for our sake and the future generations.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
